component.name: weka
component.title: Weka
component.description: The camel-weka component provides Data Mining functionality through Weka.
component.label: Datamining

lazyStartProducer.label: producer
lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

basicPropertyBinding.label: advanced
basicPropertyBinding.description: Whether the component should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

basicPropertyBinding.label: advanced
basicPropertyBinding.description: Whether the endpoint should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

synchronous.label: advanced
synchronous.description: Sets whether synchronous processing should be strictly used, or Camel is allowed to use asynchronous processing (if supported).

dsname.label: model
dsname.description: The named dataset to train the classifier with

folds.label: model
folds.description: Number of folds to use for cross-validation

loadFrom.label: model
loadFrom.description: Path to load the model from

saveTo.label: model
saveTo.description: Path to save the model to

seed.label: model
seed.description: An optional seed for the randomizer

xval.label: model
xval.description: Flag on whether to use cross-validation with the current dataset

path.label: read,write
path.description: An in/out path for the read/write commands
